A

ALL - Static variable in class com.topcoder.util.log.Level
Public constant for the ALL logging level.
AbstractLog - class com.topcoder.util.log.AbstractLog.
This is an abstract implementation of the Log interface that can provide common services to Log implementations.
AbstractLog(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.AbstractLog
This constructor will set the state information for this abstract class.

B

BasicLog - class com.topcoder.util.log.basic.BasicLog.
This is the basic implementation of the Log interface that will write the logging message to the specified print stream.
BasicLogFactory - class com.topcoder.util.log.basic.BasicLogFactory.
This is the implementation of the LogFactory interface that will create BasicLog instances based on the print stream given.
BasicLogFactory() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.basic.BasicLogFactory
Constructs the BasicLogFactory using the System.out print stream.
BasicLogFactory(PrintStream) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.basic.BasicLogFactory
Constructs the BasicLogFactory using the specified print stream.

Returns whether the given level is enabled for a specific implementation.
isEnabled(Level) - Method in class com.topcoder.util.log.basic.BasicLog
This method should return true, because levels are meaningless for the basic logger.
isEnabled(Level) - Method in class com.topcoder.util.log.jdk14.Jdk14Log
Checks if a certain logging level is presently enabled and will return true if it is, false otherwise.
isEnabled(Level) - Method in class com.topcoder.util.log.log4j.Log4jLog

J

Jdk14Log - class com.topcoder.util.log.jdk14.Jdk14Log.
This is the implementation of the Log interface that will write the logging messages to the specified java logging system.
Jdk14LogFactory - class com.topcoder.util.log.jdk14.Jdk14LogFactory.
This is the implementation of the LogFactory interface that will create Jdk14Log instances based on the java logger for the given name.
Jdk14LogFactory() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.jdk14.Jdk14LogFactory
Constructs the Jdk14LogFactory.

L

Level - class com.topcoder.util.log.Level.
The Level class maintains the list of acceptable logging levels.
Log - interface com.topcoder.util.log.Log.
The Log interface should be extended by classes that wish to provide a custom logging implementation.
Log4jLog - class com.topcoder.util.log.log4j.Log4jLog.
This is the implementation of the Log interface that will write the logging messages to the specified log4j logging system.
Log4jLogFactory - class com.topcoder.util.log.log4j.Log4jLogFactory.
This is the implementation of the LogFactory interface that will create Log4jLog instances based on the log4j logger for the given name.
Log4jLogFactory() - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.log4j.Log4jLogFactory
Constructs the Log4jLogFactory using the Object Formatter component as the way to format message objects.
Log4jLogFactory(boolean) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.log4j.Log4jLogFactory
Constructs the Log4jLogFactory using the flag to indicate whether to use the log4j Layout to format message objects or to use the Object Formatter component to format message objects.
LogException - exception com.topcoder.util.log.LogException.
Exception class for all logging exceptions thrown from this API.
LogException(Throwable) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.LogException
Constructor takes a throwable as the underlying exception.
LogException(String) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.LogException
Constructs the exception from the specified message.
LogException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for class com.topcoder.util.log.LogException
Constructs the exception from the specified message and throwable.
LogFactory - interface com.topcoder.util.log.LogFactory.
This interface defines the contract for implementations that will produce Log instances.
LogManager - class com.topcoder.util.log.LogManager.
This is the main class for the Logging Wrapper component.
